channel.title: How to calm a sore throuht (without medicine )
channel.description:
Sorry for my spelling
Step 1)eat a spoonful of IceCream ( Chocolate is the best ) Step 2)drink a bowlful of something sweet Step 3)eat a slice of WholeWheat Bread
i did this a few minutes ago ;D

item.title: How to calm a sore throuht (without medicine )
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

TheBeanie:

I Found getting drunk out meh head useful, made me forget about it, until i woke up with a monster hangover and a even worse sore throat, god knows what i was doing, cant remember nothing rofl.

Lol when I got drunk my brother pushed me over and I fell on the sweets tin and when I woke up my arm was fucking black + blue and bruised like hell and I only felt the pain when I was drunk for like 5~ seconds.

Read full topic
